speaking digital assets can be
classified in five broad categories
first cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and
ether now cryptocurrencies are native
assets belonging to its respective
Network so for instance ether is a
cryptocurrency currency of ethereum
Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency of Bitcoin
Network and these digital assets are
created and paid to entities who help in
mining block on these
Network the second uh digital asset uh
which I will talk is stable coin stable
coin are digital assets that maintain a
stable value Rel relative to a um
specified asset which could be either a

or it could be a cryptocurrency like e
so for instance usdc maintains a stable
value with US Dollars the third type of

is the utility
tokens now utility tokens are usually

or Services these tokens are different
from cryptocurrency like e or Bitcoin as
anybody can issue these
token the fourth type of U digital asset
is security token security token
commonly is used to provide tokenization
solutions for traditional financial
instruments like stock and bonds and
lastly I would uh want to talk about
nfts nft tokens or non-fungible tokens
um are unique token that establish

for its

in 2022 the cryptocurrency custody

customer developing digital asset
custody uh and wallet application need

they have to build complex ETL processes
on the blockchain
data this is where Amazon managed
blockchain service or amb for
short brings a lot of value to our

fully managed blockchain service which
allow customers to build on blockchain
with reliable and scalable apis and
without any specialized
infrastructure amb currently supports
multiple blockchain including Bitcoin
and ethereum the two blockchain Network
that traditional financial institution
are very keen to start with amb access
allow connectivity to bitcoin network
via a seress offering whereas ethereum
access is provided through a dedic ated
node for ethereum chain using amb
customer can establish instant
connectivity to bitcoin and ethereum
network to support use cases like
digital asset custody wallet and
tokenization a query delivers onchain
data with subsec latency so you can
serve historic and realtime data to your
application without specialized
infrastructure amb query provides simple
API for application to quick get
blockchain data without customer having
to perform ongoing complex data
transformation or store blockchain data
in
definitely since many of the digital
asset custody solution will entail some
sort of wallet capability let's look at
a digital asset custody use case in
conjunction with digital wallets here is
a reference architecture showing how a
typical digital asset custody solution
might look like on AWS
infrastructure starting from the right
you have custody portal that the user of
the solution will access and after the
user verification process he might be
presented with a screen that show all
the balances of all the cryptocurrency
or token that this particular user owns
now in order for the portal to show
these balances the portal UI might call
a rest API running on AWS Lambda that
will internally call amb query to
retrieve the user
balances what if now this user wants to
buy e By by using some of his Bitcoins
in this scenario the custodes
application has to send transaction to
both the Bitcoin Network and the
ethereum network by signing those
transaction with the keys associated
with that
user and this is where the custody
solution would have to implement a
digital wallet using aw services like
KMS and Nitro Enclave once a user
transaction is signed by his private key
the backend component of this portal can
use amb access to send those transaction
to the appropriate blockchain
Network this concludes this short video
